name: OBSCUR3D
description:
1. Want to cheese something into looking less bad?
  2.  Bloom

First of all, Why OBSCUR3D?

I couldn't really come up with a name, so I went the chad route and used randomwordgenerator, but OBSCURED was too basic, so to be cool and quirky I replaced the E with a 3 (Super original I know)

An odd way of approaching the rhythm-platformer genre, Originally made just for my MYP Personal Project, but after spending so much time on it, it's become something I genuinely want to complete sometime later on. Right now, it's nothing but a concept that doesn't make all that much sense, but definitely will once I finally finish some sort of a tutorial level.

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Z to jump
  • X to attack
  • C to dash
  • V for projectile

100% not stolen assets

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/metroidvania-controller-1667... (Will most definitely be re-writing most of this later, as it's extremely Janky with tilemap colliders it seems)
  • https://github.com/sonicether/SE-Natural-Bloom-Dirty-Lens/tree/master/Assets/SE%...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/graphy-ultimate-fps-counter-stat...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/ultimate-circular-health-bars-li...
